title: Authors and Citation
text: package maintainer. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ww (2024). gauntletReactable: Package (Title Case). R package version 0.1.0, https://michaelgaunt404.github.io/gauntletReactable/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gauntletReactable: What the Package Does (Title Case)},   author = {Who wrote it},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://michaelgaunt404.github.io/gauntletReactable/}, }

what: Generate column definitions for aggregating specified columns by a specified metric in a Reactable table — colDef_agg
title: Generate column definitions for aggregating specified columns by a specified metric in a Reactable table — colDef_agg
text: colDef_agg function generates column definitions aggregating specified columns specified metric Reactable table. creates column definitions based provided column names, metric aggregation function, whether remove footer column definitions.

title: Generate column definitions for aggregating specified columns by a specified metric in a Reactable table — colDef_agg
code: colDef_agg(cols, rm_footer = T, agg_fun = "sum")

title: Generate column definitions for aggregating specified columns by a specified metric in a Reactable table — colDef_agg
text: cols character vector specifying column names aggregated. rm_footer logical value indicating whether remove footer column definitions. Default TRUE. agg_fun character string specifying aggregation function applied. Default "sum". possible values include functions available dplyr package "mean", "median", etc.

title: Generate column definitions for aggregating specified columns by a specified metric in a Reactable table — colDef_agg
text: list column definitions suitable use Reactable table specified         columns aggregated specified metric.

title: Generate column definitions for aggregating specified columns by a specified metric in a Reactable table — colDef_agg
code: library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tibble) library(magrittr) library(reactable)  mtcars %>%   rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   mutate(cars = gsub(" .*", "\\1", cars)) %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     groupBy = "cars",     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_agg(cols = c("am", "gear", "carb"), agg_fun = "sum")     )   ) #> Error in map(., ~.x[names(.x) != "footer"]): could not find function "map"

what: Define column widths for attributes in a reactable table — colDef_colWidth_robust
title: Define column widths for attributes in a reactable table — colDef_colWidth_robust
text: function allows define column widths different attributes reactable table.

title: Define column widths for attributes in a reactable table — colDef_colWidth_robust
code: colDef_colWidth_robust(   cols,   minWidth = NA,   maxWidth = NA,   width = NA,   wrap = F )

title: Define column widths for attributes in a reactable table — colDef_colWidth_robust
text: cols character vector specifying attributes column widths defined. minWidth Minimum width columns. Default NA. maxWidth Maximum width columns. Default NA. width Width columns. Default NA. wrap Logical indicating whether wrap text columns. Default FALSE.

title: Define column widths for attributes in a reactable table — colDef_colWidth_robust
text: list column definitions specified attributes, width settings applied.

title: Define column widths for attributes in a reactable table — colDef_colWidth_robust
code: rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     groupBy = "cars",     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_colWidth_robust(cols = c("cars", "mpg"), minWidth = 400)       # ,colDef_hide(cols = c("vs", "am", "gear", "carb", "wt"))     )   ) #> Error in rownames_to_column("cars"): is.data.frame(df) is not TRUE

what: Generate column definitions with filter dropdown menus for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_filter_select
title: Generate column definitions with filter dropdown menus for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_filter_select
text: colDef_filter_select function generates column definitions filter dropdown menus specified columns Reactable table. creates column definitions based provided column names unique ID Reactable table.

title: Generate column definitions with filter dropdown menus for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_filter_select
code: colDef_filter_select(cols, id)

title: Generate column definitions with filter dropdown menus for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_filter_select
text: cols character vector specifying column names filter dropdown menus column definitions generated. id character string specifying unique ID Reactable table. ID specified function call Reactable table definition using `elementId` parameter setting `filterable = TRUE`.

title: Generate column definitions with filter dropdown menus for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_filter_select
text: list column definitions suitable use Reactable table filter dropdown menus.

title: Generate column definitions with filter dropdown menus for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_filter_select
code: # Set the unique ID for the Reactable table id <- "temp_id"  mtcars %>%   rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_filter_select(cols = c("cars"), id = id)     ),     elementId = id, filterable = TRUE   ) #> Error in map(item_list, names): could not find function "map"

what: Generate column definitions to hide specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_hide
title: Generate column definitions to hide specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_hide
text: colDef_hide function generates column definitions hide specified columns Reactable table without removing data frame object. creates column definitions based provided column names.

title: Generate column definitions to hide specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_hide
code: colDef_hide(cols)

title: Generate column definitions to hide specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_hide
text: cols character vector specifying column names hidden.

title: Generate column definitions to hide specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_hide
text: list column definitions suitable use Reactable table.

title: Generate column definitions to hide specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_hide
code: mtcars %>%   rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_hide(cols = c("vs", "am", "gear", "carb", "wt"))     )   ) #> Error in map(item_list, names): could not find function "map"

what: Generate column definitions with minimum width for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_minwidth
title: Generate column definitions with minimum width for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_minwidth
text: colDef_minwidth function generates column definitions minimum width specified columns Reactable table. creates column definitions based provided column names desired minimum width.

title: Generate column definitions with minimum width for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_minwidth
code: colDef_minwidth(cols, width)

title: Generate column definitions with minimum width for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_minwidth
text: cols character vector specifying column names minimum width column definitions generated. width integer specifying minimum width specified columns.

title: Generate column definitions with minimum width for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_minwidth
text: list column definitions suitable use Reactable table.

title: Generate column definitions with minimum width for specified columns in a Reactable table — colDef_minwidth
code: mtcars %>%   rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_minwidth(cols = c("mpg", "cyl"), width = 300)     )   ) #> Error in map(item_list, names): could not find function "map"

what: Generate sticky column definitions for a Reactable table — colDef_sticky
title: Generate sticky column definitions for a Reactable table — colDef_sticky
text: colDef_sticky function generates column definitions sticky behavior Reactable table. creates column definitions based provided column names side columns stick.

title: Generate sticky column definitions for a Reactable table — colDef_sticky
code: colDef_sticky(cols, side = "left")

title: Generate sticky column definitions for a Reactable table — colDef_sticky
text: cols character vector specifying column names sticky column definitions generated. side character string specifying side columns stick. Default "left".

title: Generate sticky column definitions for a Reactable table — colDef_sticky
text: list column definitions suitable use Reactable table.

title: Generate sticky column definitions for a Reactable table — colDef_sticky
code: library(reactable) library(dplyr)  mtcars %>%   rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_sticky(cols = c("cars", "mpg"))     )   ) #> Error in map(item_list, names): could not find function "map"  # This example creates a Reactable table with sticky columns # using the \code{colDef_sticky} function.

what: Generate column definitions for hyperlinked URLs — colDef_urlLink
title: Generate column definitions for hyperlinked URLs — colDef_urlLink
text: colDef_urlLink function generates column definitions hyperlinked URLs Reactable table. creates column definitions based provided column names text display link.

title: Generate column definitions for hyperlinked URLs — colDef_urlLink
code: colDef_urlLink(cols, link_text)

title: Generate column definitions for hyperlinked URLs — colDef_urlLink
text: cols character vector specifying column names hyperlink column definitions generated. link_text character string specifying text displayed link.

title: Generate column definitions for hyperlinked URLs — colDef_urlLink
text: list column definitions suitable use Reactable table.

title: Generate column definitions for hyperlinked URLs — colDef_urlLink
code: mtcars %>%   mutate(url_raw = "www.google.com",          url_names = rownames(.)) %>%   remove_rownames() %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_urlLink(cols = "url_raw", link_text = "Example text to link")     )   ) #> Error in map(item_list, names): could not find function "map"

title: colDef_urlLink_spec Function Documentation — colDef_urlLink_spec
text: Description:   colDef_urlLink_spec function designed generate column definitions hyperlinked URLs Reactable table. creates column definitions based provided column names, column containing URLs, dataset.

title: colDef_urlLink_spec Function Documentation — colDef_urlLink_spec
code: colDef_urlLink_spec(cols, col_url, data)

title: colDef_urlLink_spec Function Documentation — colDef_urlLink_spec
text: Usage:   colDef_urlLink_spec(cols, col_url, data) Parameters:   - cols: character vector specifying column names column definitions need generated.   - col_url: character string specifying name column containing URLs.   - data: data frame containing dataset. Details:   function generates column definitions hyperlinked URLs Reactable table. creates column definitions HTML anchor tags (<>) link URLs provided specified column. Examples:   # Define sample function call   temp_df <- mtcars      dplyr::mutate(url_raw = "www.google.com",                   url_names = rownames(.))      tibble::remove_rownames() # Generate Reactable table hyperlinked URLs   temp_df      reactable::reactable(       defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),       columns = combined_named_lists(         colDef_urlLink_spec(cols = "url_names", col_url = "url_raw", data = temp_df)       )     )

what: Combine multiple column definitions into a single named list for use in a Reactable table — combined_named_lists
title: Combine multiple column definitions into a single named list for use in a Reactable table — combined_named_lists
text: combined_named_lists function combines multiple column definitions generated various functions single named list suitable use Reactable table. takes multiple sets column definitions input combines single named list.

title: Combine multiple column definitions into a single named list for use in a Reactable table — combined_named_lists
code: combined_named_lists(...)

title: Combine multiple column definitions into a single named list for use in a Reactable table — combined_named_lists
text: ... Multiple sets column definitions generated functions like colDef_sticky, colDef_hide, colDef_minwidth, etc.

title: Combine multiple column definitions into a single named list for use in a Reactable table — combined_named_lists
text: named list combined column definitions suitable use Reactable table.

title: Combine multiple column definitions into a single named list for use in a Reactable table — combined_named_lists
code: mtcars %>%   rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     groupBy = "cars",     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_sticky(cols = c("cars", "mpg"))       ,colDef_hide(cols = c("vs", "am", "gear", "carb", "wt"))     )   ) #> Error in map(item_list, names): could not find function "map"

what: Specify column definitions for instances of many columns at once without specifying them individually — rtrn_cols
title: Specify column definitions for instances of many columns at once without specifying them individually — rtrn_cols
text: rtrn_cols function simplifies process specifying column definitions instances many columns without specifying individually. takes singular string input source column names, "|" operator signifies "". exclude = TRUE, returns columns specified input string.

title: Specify column definitions for instances of many columns at once without specifying them individually — rtrn_cols
code: rtrn_cols(data, words, pretty = FALSE, exclude = FALSE, sort = TRUE)

title: Specify column definitions for instances of many columns at once without specifying them individually — rtrn_cols
text: data data frame column names extracted. words singular string input containing column names, "|" signifies "". pretty logical value indicating whether return column names pretty format. Default FALSE. exclude logical value indicating whether exclude specified columns. Default FALSE. sort logical value indicating whether sort column names alphabetically. Default TRUE.

title: Specify column definitions for instances of many columns at once without specifying them individually — rtrn_cols
text: vector column names specified input string.

title: Specify column definitions for instances of many columns at once without specifying them individually — rtrn_cols
code: # Create example data temp_data <- mtcars %>%   rownames_to_column("cars") %>%   mutate(cars = gsub(" .*", "\\1", cars))  print(rtrn_cols(data = temp_data, words = "cars", exclude = T)) #>  [1] "am"   "carb" "cyl"  "disp" "drat" "gear" "hp"   "mpg"  "qsec" "vs"   #> [11] "wt"   print(rtrn_cols(data = temp_data, words = "cars", exclude = F)) #> [1] "cars"  # Create a Reactable table with specified column definitions temp_data %>%   reactable(     defaultColDef = colDef(footerStyle = list(fontWeight = "bold")),     groupBy = "cars",     columns = combined_named_lists(       colDef_agg(cols = rtrn_cols(data = temp_data, words = "cars", exclude = TRUE)),       colDef_hide(cols = rtrn_cols(data = temp_data, words = "gear|am", exclude = FALSE))     )   ) #> Error in map(., ~.x[names(.x) != "footer"]): could not find function "map"
